name: Nyxian
subtitle: Unfolding the power of stock iOS coding.
description: Nyxian is a iOS app that lets you build and deploy iOS apps directly on-device without owning any computer. Means you can program where ever and when ever and in any type of situation. It currently supports iOS 15.0 upto the latest iOS version. Its designed for people that often find them selves on the go and dont want to take their mac with them selves and for the people who want to get into iOS software development but dont own a mac. Previously such a app didnt exist because no one tried to build something like that, propably because people thought that its not possible.

apps.name: Nyxian
apps.subtitle: IDE to develop native code iOS apps on unjailbroken iOS it self just via a certificate and a kernel virtualization layer for those apps.
apps.localizedDescription: Nyxian is a iOS application for iOS 17.0 and above(iOS 26.2 latest beta tested) that empowers iOS users to code, compile, link, sign and even execute/rapid test iOS applications directly on their device! It is the successor of the former FridaCodeManager project, which was deprecated in favor of Nyxian, because FridaCodeManager requires a jailbreak to work while Nyxian does not. It also includes a kernel virtualisation layer that fixes inter process stuff like signaling, enumeration, killing and spawning of processes, which also handles unsigned binaries and sends a request to the host process to sign it. This kernel virtualisation layer also has its own entitlement enforcement system the user can change directly for each individual app. Nyxian doesnt require any special entitlements, nor shared app groups.

versions.localizedDescription:
## Changelog
### Jailed
#### Nyxian
- fixed many objc object leaks (213308cbd7dfd06988c3062bb33b172c5175581d, 1f62e02604a65b13e34b829bfe41376253451b2f, c84a64d75bd40aafd435666a12bc61ecd9230c89, 1e589de103b363d9d06e1382427b08877c6d316f)
- fixed many issues with utility development (f2f06fccfe4fef1b469fd2f9c8be7522befa002c, 314f8140739fb72901575e2e1a3be6fb6f8e6359, af34bd4de370ddc1efcf52d49340e1d7cb01b8b4, 648cadc1c17caa187ed071fae83f4731ebe72c52)
- fixed some iOS panic issues(iommu panic) with utility development (8747b8e0574080964840e3cd39b65239addc7c9f)
- fixed nyxian installation on many sideloading services (cf31de8aa9d1d5f42ab7d99bf331ebf6b70e8117)

## Changelog
### Jailed
#### Nyxian
- fixed deprecation warnings in code editor disappearing (979fd8cf302fffb2d2981497a81a5a4e07069f09)
- fixed availability checks (to fix it in already existing projects append `-lclang.rt.ios` to the linker flags) (1947b21a9ae0475ea8674e99a8dcc49b2a4fa701)
- improved memory management in typechecking engine, or better said fixing a bug in the preexisting memory management fixup (9b41a360d11907063c2c2641fa9ff9b751bb6a4d)
- removed this ugly button from menubar (ebe74a1bb7d724cbd8dbf7dbc9f6f7dd73f2695a)
- made file tabs easier to navigate (cb558b4fc8b956d2f34ae3c6e037a86e7466f762)
- improved virtual keyboard handling (46e8e04e647c66013fa6d51998572227e77ce590)
- fixed file tab bar for iOS 18 and below (f0f6b72274f541c7d55218d9a7d7a3dcbec50925)
- fixing bugs in file tab removal (316ae024e798eb43c45db4f30617b49f1e85babe)
- adding file saving animation
- fixing incorrect entitlement mappings in menus (d46306cd162987b2c430f153d2b7625632763279)
- fixing credits links not working (5b349cba5e0b8340817ffde719b7a0d712ccd34b)
- fixing toggles turning white after reopening nyxian from app switcher (74abc717a489b378884d20ef619caaa7d61da8e9, 1cbb887139f4ee7051fc1a73b6640ec0f5c67b05)
- fixing font size not changing preview (e057697d07f0c46fd22c643355e8eb1f9c75a696)
- fixing window constraints math (71cf7dcce8d3b672fdce1bf58a1f36320834ddc7)
- fixing scrollbar of guest app not applying to screen bounds (e75c63b566dbdacdf9af110fd030cdcf4457615d) (only partial fix)
- fixing appearance issues (6c5fac84e8dc9ad655cb342880b18d8bcf8c868a, 36a2523a55469367c6ec7b672d4f6c9ffbcb2c5e)
#### Kernel Virtualization Layer (ksurface)
- improved syscall server syscall registration (5da26b973c8a434ef2d74b0f0ff2cd57c8b42aec)
- improved syscall logging, aka unified it (b75f8b6c8696cc8e24c2f26775e2cc3c6dfc6b0f)

## Changelog
### Jailed
#### Nyxian
- redesigned UI for iPadOS to be more modern and more complete.
- fixed issue navigation on iPadOS.
- improved settings design.
- updated from LLVM 19.1.6 to 19.1.7
- improved windowing system on iPadOS (now you can place windows out of your screen constraints)
- update default icon
#### Kernel Virtualization Layer (ksurface)
- improved `fork()` and `posix_spawn()` fix (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/d627cab99b851300db0940f28fa44719154d5d1f, https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/92cd379e7617ab22a4fc220b7f478d3a242962ec, https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/420f6c8c96555c5b5a94788bc833fcc2c5b425af, https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/a23b981013b18c45c40a93d2d125424ce29fb127)
- fixed buffer overflow in `proc_fork()` (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/6486d2034af21fdd2e01e244750f362d8c140af3)
- fixed reference leak in `proc_fork()` (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/fbc9ce4d3f5441f40a2980a3f75c53e8ac1a9ddb)
- fixed process state manipulation vulnerability (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/56ed04808f656eafc1b6a0e57d0ba27e6cac6994)
- extended libproc fix
- fixed memory leak/corruption vulnerability in syscall client (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/faef54f057397acdca002872616b562861ef04d5)
- fixed process enumeration priveleges (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/014d46d9a0a6b49d3b962340584cfa58fc8ff8e7)
- fixed buffer over-read in `SYS_SETHOSTNAME` (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/0bdc721b5c04dd851d03f22b36cb0bcfd32219e3)
- fixed DOS in `SYS_GETHOSTNAME` (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/b09e54006470f164a2746de0a3e665f3ad611e38)
- fixed race condition which could lead to a privilege escalation in `permissive_over_pid()` (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/560bd4793ceae51c1faef96950f01ea236c4e319)

## Changelog
### Jailed
#### Nyxian
- compatibility patches for older iOS versions(16.x/17.x) have been done.
- redesigned UI for older iOS to look more modern, similar to the design philosophy of Nyxian on iOS 26.x
- bootstrapping now is plist based instead of NSUserDefaults(cuz we cannot predict if its really bootstrapped without that)

#### Kernel Virtualoization Layer (ksurface)
- fixed vulnerability where old iOS versions cause ksurface to panic because of not nullified memory (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/89f37b57afb2ef8006abde3dbe9cd6b43cd6570d and https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/aa1a37953d181d53002e420758506021d609ba0c)
- fixed being able to set invalid hostnames (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/8b4e0750d0a6eb4839c2b79de26a3e6c483d8d81)
- fixing buffer overflow vulnerability in SYS_proctb syscall (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/a85fe7ea5316b700cd14762ad8b9f6f2b81865d8) (probably unreachable because of memory constraints on jailed iOS)
- fixing process structure poisoning  (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/387258a6914c97e19d1d146c36841c8f55bd2755)
- fixing latent vulnerability in SYS_gettask syscall, caused by a invalid cleanup path, but invalid because proc copy structure destruction symbol does a null pointer check (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/9f54fca130934287eecf99fe5f27df9d64eb48c9)
- fixed task port confusion vulnerability between the SYS_gettask and SYS_sentask syscall which could lead to mach ports being reused that were used by other processes. (https://github.com/ProjectNyxian/Nyxian/commit/6dc19a64fb8fcc42b95d94dc49d4f4f327828112)

EXTREMELY NECESSARY UPDATE

### Changelog
- Fixed  `LDEThreadController` object leak causing infinite pthreads to be created
- Fixed sub iOS 26.0 crash in code editor

### Changelog
- Added support for 3D rendering frameworks (simd fix)
- Implemented hardened kernel virtualization layer
- Introduced pointers to the kernel virtualization layer
- Improved a lot of kernel APIs
- Improved compilation speed(introduced `LDEGroupThreadController` and `LDEThreadController` that now work way more managed by the mach API)
- Added actual syscall translation to the kernel virtualization layer that will entirely replace the `ServerSession` NSXPC proxy
- Fixed a ton of race conditions and logic vulnerabilities
- Improved design a lot(especially in app switcher)
- Fixed UNIX semantics(we were treating ruid as euid ;w;)
- Resecuring instead of bypassing the NSExtension security
- Fixed(again) gethostname and sethostname

### Notes
In 0.9.x aka the beta of Nyxian we introduce swift support to Nyxian. swift is a mess to patch and optimize for use in iOS and we actually care about user experience.

### Changelog
#### UI & UX
- Added modernized iOS 26 UI
- Rewrote XCButton in ObjC
- Added a app switcher button for iOS 26
#### Kernel Virtualization Layer
- Fixed vulnerability #14 "Daemon endpoint override"  (Addressed with improved logic checks)
- Fixed vulnerability #15 "Duplicated process entries" (Addressed with improved logic checks)
- Improved proc api
### Note
Although the changelog is not that big the change in Nyxian is huge. The fixed vulnerabilities caused tremendous trouble, Nyxians stability is tremendously improved in this build!

news.title: Nyxian for jailbroken devices is coming...
news.caption: For Rootless and later Rootful!
